original_title: Doki Doki ヴァージン　もういちど I LOVE YOU
overview: Just when Hideki thinks he will lose his virginity, he gets hit by a car, and dies. God gives him a 2nd chance by placing his mind into the body of Sachiko's best friend, a girl. Can he convince Sachiko of his love?
title: Doki doki Virgin mô ichido I Love You
